function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Open plan apartments and removable partitions may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases within the building.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and difficulty in containment if an outbreak occurs.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting vaccination, and maintaining adequate ventilation systems within the building.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, touchless fixtures, and smart building management systems.","People":"Residents, visitors, and building maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Conversion of spaces for gathering and social interaction may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission, especially during a pandemic.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contagious disease spread and challenges in enforcing social distancing measures.","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of attendees, promoting outdoor gatherings, and providing clear guidelines for safe interactions.","Technologies":"Smart occupancy monitoring systems and outdoor social distancing markers.","People":"Residents, event organizers, and community leaders.","Owner":"Building management and local authorities."},{"Description":"Greening of flat roofs and creation of urban gardens may introduce new disease vectors and require careful management to prevent the spread of infectious diseases.","Impact":"Risk of insect-borne or waterborne diseases and potential contamination of food produce.","Mitigation":"Implementing pest control measures, regular inspection of garden areas, and proper sanitation practices.","Technologies":"Integrated pest management systems and automated irrigation systems.","People":"Residents, gardeners, and maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Building management and horticultural experts."}]}
